company_filter.title: Company filter
company_filter.note: Filter by company. Possible values: 0 = Any, -1 = unassigned or any if from the /listCompanies api

archived_filter.title: Archived filter
archived_filter.note: Filter archived documents. Possible values: 0 = Only not archived, 1 = Any, 2 = Only archived

document_type_filter.title: Document type filter
document_type_filter.note: Document type. Possible values: INCOMING_INVOICE / RECEIPT / PAYMENT_RECEIPT / EXPENSE_REIMBURSEMENT / SALES_INVOICE / CREDIT_NOTE / STATEMENT / DELIVERY_NOTE / ORDER_CONFIRMATION / PAYROLL / COMPANY_REGISTRATION_DOCUMENT / MISC.

prim_uid_exclusion_filter.title: Prim uid exclusion filter
prim_uid_exclusion_filter.note: Comma separated list of prim_uids that should not be in the results.

prim_uid_start_filter.title: Prim uid start filter
prim_uid_start_filter.note: prim_uid that can be used to limit result to only higher prim_uids.

updated_or_new_since_filter.title: Updated or new since filter
updated_or_new_since_filter.note: Limit result to documents modified or created after given date.
